import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import productcontext from "../context/Productcontext"; import StarRatings from "react-star-ratings"; import Navbar from "./Navbar"; const {Link} = require("react-router-dom"); export default function Productdetails() { const { singleproduct,addid ,addtocart} = useContext(productcontext); const[credentials,setcredentials]=useState({size:"",quantity:""}) const onclick=async()=>{ await addtocart(addid) } const onchange=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); setcredentials({ ...credentials,[e.target.name]:e.target.value }) } return ( <>
